Description: Book of the Dead of Ani; frame 2; full colour vignettes; red borders. Vignette of sunrise; hymn to Osiris.
Curator's comments: Published: R. Freed, A Divine Tour of Ancient Egypt, Memphis 1983, pp. 30-31, 94 [11]. James in Davies, Colour and Painting, London 2001, p. 142, col. pl. 48 [1]. Strudwick, Masterpieces of Ancient Egypt, London 2006, pp. 218-21. Tarasenko, Mykola. 2016. Studies on the vignettes from chapter 17 of the Book of the Dead. I, The image of mś.w Bdšt in ancient Egyptian mythology (Archaeopress Egyptology 16), Oxford, p. 100.
Bibliographic references: Quirke 1993 / Owners of funerary papyri in the British Museum (24)
Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (134357) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/134357)
Exhibition history: Exhibited: 1983 Sep-Dec, Memphis, Art Gallery of Memphis, A Divine Tour of Ancient Egypt
Condition: Papyrus Survey: Condition Details: Papyrus: loss, fractured Black ink Red ink Pigment (loss) Backed: brown paper Mount Details: Sandwich: glass Sandwich: board Binding: cloth Object Priority: B Mount Priority: A Overall Condition: B Curatorial condition comment: good
Acquisition name: Donated by: Sir Ernest A T Wallis Budge
